place.name: RESTALRIG
place.gazetteerText: Restalrig, ancient barony and vil., South Leith par., Edinburghshire, in NE. vicinity of Edinburgh. See JOCK'S LODGE. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
